TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObserver`1<- T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IObserver

span.span: The object that provides notification information.

summary.span: 提供用于接收基于推送的通知的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for receiving push-based notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和接口提供通用的机制，以基于推送的通知，也称为观察程序设计模式。The and interfaces provide a generalized mechanism for push-based notification, also known as the observer design pattern. 接口表示发送通知 （提供程序）; 类接口表示接收它们 （观察者） 的类。The interface represents the class that sends notifications (the provider); the interface represents the class that receives them (the observer). `T` 表示提供通知信息的类。`T` represents the class that provides the notification information. 实现排列从提供程序接收通知 (实现) 通过将自身的一个实例传递给提供程序的方法。An implementation arranges to receive notifications from a provider (an implementation) by passing an instance of itself to the provider's method. 此方法返回可以用于取消订阅之前提供程序观察者对象完成发送通知。This method returns an object that can be used to unsubscribe the observer before the provider finishes sending notifications. 接口定义观察者必须实现以下三种方法：The interface defines the following three methods that the observer must implement: - 方法，这通常称为提供程序提供观察程序提供新的数据或状态信息。The method, which is typically called by the provider to supply the observer with new data or state information. - 方法，通常会调用的提供商联系，以指示数据是不可用，无法访问，或已损坏，或提供程序遇到某些其他错误条件。The method, which is typically called by the provider to indicate that data is unavailable, inaccessible, or corrupted, or that the provider has experienced some other error condition. - 方法，这通常称为提供程序，以指示它已完成将通知发送给观察者。The method, which is typically called by the provider to indicate that it has finished sending notifications to observers. ## Examples 下面的示例演示观察程序设计模式。The following example illustrates the observer design pattern. 它定义`Location`包含纬度和经度信息的类。It defines a `Location` class that contains latitude and longitude information. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#5)] `LocationReporter`类提供实现。The `LocationReporter` class provides the implementation. 它向控制台显示有关当前的位置的信息。It displays information about the current location to the console. 其构造函数包括`name`参数，它允许`LocationReporter`实例在其字符串输出中标识自身。Its constructor includes a `name` parameter, which allows the `LocationReporter` instance to identify itself in its string output. 它还包括`Subscribe`方法，该包装到提供程序的调用方法方法。It also includes a `Subscribe` method, which wraps a call to the provider's method. 这样，方法将返回到私有变量的引用。This enables the method to assign the returned reference to a private variable. `LocationReporter`类还进行了`Unsubscribe`方法，后者将调用方法返回的对象方法。The `LocationReporter` class also includes an `Unsubscribe` method, which calls the method of the object returned by the method. 下面的代码定义`LocationReporter`类。The following code defines the `LocationReporter` class. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#8)] `LocationTracker`类提供实现。The `LocationTracker` class provides the implementation. 其`TrackLocation`方法传递一个可以为 null`Location`包含纬度和经度数据的对象。Its `TrackLocation` method is passed a nullable `Location` object that contains the latitude and longitude data. 如果`Location`值不是`null`、`TrackLocation`方法调用的每个观察程序的方法。If the `Location` value is not `null`, the `TrackLocation` method calls the method of each observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#6)] 如果`Location`值是`null`、`TrackLocation`方法实例化`LocationNotFoundException`对象，在下面的示例所示。If the `Location` value is `null`, the `TrackLocation` method instantiates a `LocationNotFoundException` object, which is shown in the following example. 然后，它调用每个观察程序方法并将其传递`LocationNotFoundException`对象。It then calls each observer's method and passes it the `LocationNotFoundException` object. 请注意，`LocationNotFoundException`派生自但未添加任何新的成员。Note that `LocationNotFoundException` derives from but does not add any new members. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#7)] 观察者注册以接收通知从`TrackLocation`对象通过调用其方法，将对观察程序对象的引用分配给私有泛型对象。Observers register to receive notifications from a `TrackLocation` object by calling its method, which assigns a reference to the observer object to a private generic object. 该方法返回`Unsubscriber`对象，它是使观察程序停止接收通知的实现。The method returns an `Unsubscriber` object, which is an implementation that enables observers to stop receiving notifications. `LocationTracker`类还进行了`EndTransmission`方法。The `LocationTracker` class also includes an `EndTransmission` method. 当没有更多位置数据可用时，该方法调用每个观察程序方法，然后再清除观察者的内部列表。When no further location data is available, the method calls each observer's method and then clears the internal list of observers. 提供程序和观察者，然后实例化下面的代码。The following code then instantiates the provider and the observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/module1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCompleted() cil managed

summary.span: 通知观察者提供程序已完成发送基于推送的通知。

span.span: Notifies the observer that the provider has finished sending push-based notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当观察程序的调用实现，方法可以根据需要调用方法对象调用时返回到观察者方法。When the observer's implementation is called, the method can optionally call the method of the object that was returned to the observer when it called the method. ## Examples 下面的示例提供的实现纬度/经度跟踪应用程序中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 该方法仅报告没有更多数据可用，然后调用提供程序的实现。The method simply reports that no further data is available and calls the provider's implementation. 请参阅示例部分有关完整示例的主题。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnError(class System.Exception error) cil managed

param.name: error
param.span: 提供有关错误的附加信息的对象。

span.span: An object that provides additional information about the error.

summary.span: 通知观察者提供程序遇到错误情况。

span.span: Notifies the observer that the provider has experienced an error condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管`error`是一个对象，派生自，不一定表示由提供程序引发的异常。Although `error` is an object that is derived from , it does not necessarily represent an exception that is thrown by the provider. 它还可以表示例程或预期的错误条件，例如数据丢失或不可用。It can also represent a routine or expected error condition, such as data that is missing or unavailable. 方法应被视为信息性消息、 和提供程序不应指望观察者提供错误处理。The method should be seen as informational, and the provider should not expect the observer to provide error handling. ## Examples 下面的示例提供的实现纬度/经度跟踪应用程序中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 该方法仅报告数据当前不可用;它不会进行使用对象作为参数传递给它。The method simply reports that data is currently unavailable; it does not make use of the object passed to it as a parameter. 请参阅示例部分有关完整示例的主题。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnNext(!T value) cil managed

span.span: Provides the observer with new data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 观察程序已调用提供程序的后方法，该提供程序调用观察程序的方法以提供通知。After an observer has called a provider's method, the provider calls the observer's method to provide notifications. ## Examples 下面的示例提供的实现纬度/经度跟踪应用程序中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 请参阅示例部分有关完整示例的主题。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#12)]
